svg.title: Sewing Pattern and Stations
svg.desc: Sewing Pattern and Stations: registration and reference points for master and paramentric elements

text.style: font-family: courier; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: bold; font-size: 8px; fill:red; dominant-baseline: central;

text.tspan: F(x,y), F2(x,y), f(x,y), f2(x,y)=x and y values reversed from equivalentin the G series (G, G2, g, g2)
Examples: (a) Sewing stations measurements (vertical diagram scaled down 30%)(b)Sewing path with sewing supports and thread(c)Sewing stations measurements (horizontal diagram)
